div.h2: v2 Identifier Type - AU Extended - DVA Specifc Card Types

div.p: HL7 V2 table 0203 extensions for Australian use DVA specific coloured card type identifiers
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org.au/fhir/v2/0203
CodeDisplay
DVWDVA White Card NumberDepartment of Veterans' Affairs Number (White Card)
DVGDVA Gold Card NumberDepartment of Veterans' Affairs Number (Gold Card)
DVODVA Orange Card NumberDepartment of Veterans' Affairs Number (Orange Card)
